Chinese1: 我们需要注意什么？
Translate1: What should we be aware of?

Chinese1: 能不能看到美景？
Translate1: Can we see beautiful scenery?

Chinese1: 我们要爬到哪里？
Translate1: Where are we climbing to?

Chinese1: 共同努力才能成功。
Translate1: We can only succeed if we work together.

Pinyin1: néngfǒu gàosu wǒ xiàshān de lù zěnme zǒu ？
Chinese1: 能否告诉我下山的路怎么走？
Translate1: Can you tell me how to get down the mountain?

Chinese1: 手套忘记带了怎么办？
Translate1: What do I do if I forgot my gloves?

Chinese1: 快照时间来了！
Translate1: It's time for a photo!

Chinese1: 这个路标指向山顶吗？
Translate1: Does this sign point to the mountain top?

Chinese1: 我们需要带上手电筒吗？
Translate1: Do we need to bring a flashlight?

Chinese1: 我们走哪条路线？
Translate1: Which route are we taking?

Chinese1: 有没有人害怕高度？
Translate1: Is anyone afraid of heights?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuānguò zhètiáo hé ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿过这条河吗？
Translate1: Do we need to cross this river?

Chinese1: 小心脚下。
Translate1: Be careful of your footing.

Chinese1: 大家都很有精神！
Translate1: Everyone is very energetic!

Chinese1: 我们应该遵守哪些行为准则？
Translate1: What code of conduct should we follow?

Chinese1: 这里的路况如何？
Translate1: What are the road conditions here?

Chinese1: 请大家保持安静。
Translate1: Please keep quiet.

Pinyin1: kàn nàbian de jǐngsè zhēnměi a ！
Chinese1: 看那边的景色真美啊！
Translate1: The scenery over there is so beautiful!

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhè tiáo lùtōng bù tōngwǎng shāndǐng ？
Chinese1: 请问这条路通不通往山顶？
Translate1: Excuse me, does this road lead to the mountain top?

Chinese1: 我们要去哪个方向？
Translate1: Which direction should we go in?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有水源？
Translate1: Is there a water source here?

Pinyin1: shìfǒu kěyǐ dài chǒngwù yīqǐ dēngshān ？
Chinese1: 是否可以带宠物一起登山？
Translate1: Can we bring pets to climb?

Chinese1: 这里有没有险象环生的地方？
Translate1: Are there any dangerous areas around here?

Pinyin1: xūyào zhùyì shénme ānquán wèntí ma ？
Chinese1: 需要注意什么安全问题吗？
Translate1: Are there any safety concerns we should be aware of?

Pinyin1: wǒmen shìfǒu kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ shāokǎo ？
Chinese1: 我们是否可以在这里烧烤？
Translate1: Can we have a barbecue here?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào xiàng shàngpá duōshǎo gè gāodù ？
Chinese1: 我们需要向上爬多少个高度？
Translate1: How many elevations do we need to climb?

Chinese1: 爬山难不难？
Translate1: Is mountain climbing difficult?

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài nǎlǐ zhǎodào dìtú ？
Chinese1: 我们可以在哪里找到地图？
Translate1: Where can we find a map?

Pinyin1: shìfǒu kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ diàoyú huò yóuyǒng ？
Chinese1: 是否可以在这里钓鱼或游泳？
Translate1: Can we fish or swim here?

Chinese1: 把垃圾带回去。
Translate1: Take your trash with you.

Pinyin1: nǐ xūyào wǒ bāng nǐ xiédài shénme ma ？
Chinese1: 你需要我帮你携带什么吗？
Translate1: Do you need me to carry anything for you?

Chinese1: 这里有没有分叉路口？
Translate1: Are there any forks in the road here?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yào zěnme zǒu cáinéng dàodá shāndǐng ？
Chinese1: 我们要怎么走才能到达山顶？
Translate1: How can we get to the mountain top?

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhètiáo lù tōngwǎng shāndǐng ma ？
Chinese1: 请问这条路通往山顶吗？
Translate1: Is this road leading to the mountain top?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào xiǎoxīn kuàguò zhètiáo hé ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要小心跨过这条河吗？
Translate1: Do we need to be careful crossing this river?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有登山地图？
Translate1: Do you have a hiking map here?

Chinese1: 是否需要带上防蚊液？
Translate1: Do we need to bring mosquito repellent?

Chinese1: 这条路通往山顶吗？
Translate1: Does this path lead to the mountain peak?

Chinese1: 我们应该带上多少水？
Translate1: How much water should we bring?

Chinese1: 我们需要攀爬悬崖吗？
Translate1: Do we need to climb cliffs?

Pinyin1: dōu ná hǎo zhuāngbèi le ma ？
Chinese1: 都拿好装备了吗？
Translate1: Does everyone have their gear ready?

Pinyin1: xūyào wǎng nǎge fāngxiàng zǒu ne ？
Chinese1: 需要往哪个方向走呢？
Translate1: - Which direction do you need to go?

Chinese1: 景色真是太壮观了！
Translate1: The view is really spectacular!

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuān shénmeyàng de yīfú ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿什么样的衣服？
Translate1: What kind of clothes should we wear?

Pinyin1: zhè tiáo lùxiàn de chángdù shì duōshǎo ？
Chinese1: 这条路线的长度是多少？
Translate1: What is the length of this trail?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yǒuméiyǒu zúgòu de shíwù hé shuǐ ？
Chinese1: 我们有没有足够的食物和水？
Translate1: Do we have enough food and water?

Chinese1: 我们应该遵守哪些规定？
Translate1: What regulations should we follow?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào xiān chuānguò zhèpiàn shùlín ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要先穿过这片树林吗？
Translate1: Do we need to pass through this forest first?

Chinese1: 我们需要注意哪些野生动物？
Translate1: What kind of wildlife should we be aware of?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有指示牌？
Translate1: Are there any signs here?

Chinese1: 我们应该怎样处理垃圾？
Translate1: How should we handle our trash?

Pinyin1: dàtuǐ hǎosuān a ， xūyào xiūxi yīxià 。
Chinese1: 大腿好酸啊，需要休息一下。
Translate1: My thighs are so sore, I need to rest for a bit.

Chinese1: 感觉自己像个征服者！
Translate1: I feel like a conqueror!

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào dàishàng shénme zhuāngbèi ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要带上什么装备吗？
Translate1: Do we need to bring any equipment?

Chinese1: 需要多喝水保持身体水分。
Translate1: Drink more water to stay hydrated.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuānguò zhèpiàn cǎodì ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿过这片草地吗？
Translate1: Do we need to go through this grassland?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuānguò zhèpiàn yánshí qū ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿过这片岩石区吗？
Translate1: Do we need to go through this rocky area?

Chinese1: 我们是不是走错路了？
Translate1: Are we on the wrong trail?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有山路？
Translate1: Is there a mountain road here?

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn qù shāndǐng de lù zěnme zǒu ？
Chinese1: 请问去山顶的路怎么走？
Translate1: Excuse me, how do I get to the mountain peak?

Pinyin1: zhè yīduànlù bǐjiào nán zǒu ma ？
Chinese1: 这一段路比较难走吗？
Translate1: Is this section of the trail difficult?

Chinese1: 一起加油！
Translate1: Let's go!

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuānguò zhèpiàn sēnlín ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿过这片森林吗？
Translate1: Do we need to go through this forest?

Chinese1: 今天的路线有多长？
Translate1: How long is today's route?

Chinese1: 天气预报怎么样？
Translate1: What's the weather forecast?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de fēngjǐng zhēnshìtài měimiào le ！
Chinese1: 这里的风景真是太美妙了！
Translate1: The scenery here is truly magnificent!

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào xiàng nǎge fāngxiàng zǒu ？
Chinese1: 我们需要向哪个方向走？
Translate1: Which direction should we go?

Chinese1: 我们终于到达山顶了！
Translate1: We finally reached the summit!

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuānguò zhèpiàn huǒshānqū ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿过这片火山区吗？
Translate1: Do we need to go through this volcanic area?

Chinese1: 我们还需要攀爬多久？
Translate1: How much more climbing do we have to do?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有休息点？
Translate1: Excuse me, is there a rest stop here?

Chinese1: 要不要休息一下？
Translate1: Should we take a break?

Chinese1: 要注意安全哦！
Translate1: Remember to be safe!

Chinese1: 不要离开队伍。
Translate1: Don't leave the group.

Pinyin1: zhè tiáo lùxiàn shìfǒu xūyào dǎoyóu ？
Chinese1: 这条路线是否需要导游？
Translate1: Do we need a guide for this trail?

Chinese1: 我们需要带上什么装备？
Translate1: What equipment do we need to bring?

Pinyin1: xīwàng wǒmen quányuán dōu néng chénggōng dēngdǐng 。
Chinese1: 希望我们全员都能成功登顶。
Translate1: I hope everyone can successfully reach the summit.

Chinese1: 这里是否有垃圾桶？
Translate1: Is there a garbage bin here?

Chinese1: 让我们快点开始吧！
Translate1: Let's start quickly!

Chinese1: 我们要不要带上雨具？
Translate1: Should we bring rain gear?

Chinese1: 身体健康很重要。
Translate1: Physical health is important.

Pinyin1: wǎng zuǒ guǎi jiù néng dàodá shāndǐng 。
Chinese1: 往左拐就能到达山顶。
Translate1: - Turn left and you'll reach the mountaintop.

Chinese1: 这里的天气情况如何？
Translate1: What's the weather like here?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi wǎng nǎge fāngxiàng zǒu ？
Chinese1: 我们应该往哪个方向走？
Translate1: Which direction should we go?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yào pāndēng duōgāo de shānfēng ？
Chinese1: 我们要攀登多高的山峰？
Translate1: How high is the peak we're climbing?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào pānpá zhèzuò shān ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要攀爬这座山吗？
Translate1: Do we need to climb this mountain?

Pinyin1: wǒmen shìfǒu kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ lùyíng ？
Chinese1: 我们是否可以在这里露营？
Translate1: Can we camp here?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有山洞？
Translate1: Are there any caves here?

Pinyin1: zhè tiáo lùxiàn bǐjiào shìhé chūxuézhě ma ？
Chinese1: 这条路线比较适合初学者吗？
Translate1: Is this trail suitable for beginners?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi wǎng zuǒ háishi wǎngyòu zǒu ？
Chinese1: 我们应该往左还是往右走？
Translate1: Should we go left or right?

Chinese1: 需要缴纳入山费吗？
Translate1: Do we need to pay an entrance fee?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有洗手间？
Translate1: Excuse me, is there a restroom here?

Chinese1: 不要喝太多水。
Translate1: Don't drink too much water.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ shìfǒu yǒu lùtiān huò shìnèi xiūxi chù ？
Chinese1: 这里是否有露天或室内休息处？
Translate1: Is there an outdoor or indoor rest area here?

Chinese1: 请问这里有没有停车场？
Translate1: Excuse me, is there a parking lot here?

Chinese1: 我们是否需要登记许可证？
Translate1: Do we need to register for permits?

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào chuānguò zhèpiàn zhǎozé ma ？
Chinese1: 我们需要穿过这片沼泽吗？
Translate1: Do we need to go through this swamp?

Chinese1: 带不带绳索？
Translate1: Should we bring ropes?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de kōngqì hǎo qīngxīn a ！
Chinese1: 这里的空气好清新啊！
Translate1: The air here is so fresh!

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi zěnyàng zhǎodào huíchéng de lù ？
Chinese1: 我们应该怎样找到回程的路？
Translate1: How can we find our way back?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒuméiyǒu kěyǐ yěyíng de dìfāng ？
Chinese1: 这里有没有可以野营的地方？
Translate1: Are there any places to camp around here?

Pinyin1: qǐngwèn zhèlǐ yǒuméiyǒu shāndǐng de gps ？
Chinese1: 请问这里有没有山顶的GPS？
Translate1: Do you have a GPS for the mountain top here?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi gēn jǐn qiánmiàn de rén ma ？
Chinese1: 我们应该跟紧前面的人吗？
Translate1: Should we keep up with the person in front of us?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ yǒuméiyǒu dǒuqiào huò wēixiǎn de dìfāng ？
Chinese1: 这里有没有陡峭或危险的地方？
Translate1: Are there any steep or dangerous sections here?

Chinese1: 我们快到山顶了吗？
Translate1: Are we close to the summit?

Chinese1: 这个路线适合初学者吗？
Translate1: Is this trail suitable for beginners?

Chinese1: 需要准备些什么？
Translate1: What do we need to prepare?

Chinese1: 是否需要提前预约？
Translate1: Do we need to make reservations in advance?
